title: patient_by_age_range
description: SELECT * FROM ods.tbl_patient WHERE age BETWEEN :minAge AND :maxAge ORDER BY age

title: chart_by_patient
description: SELECT c.*, p.patient_name FROM ods.tbl_chart c JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON c.pt_no = p.pt_no WHERE p.pt_no = :ptNo ORDER BY c.chart_date DESC

title: chart_by_date_range
description: SELECT c.*, p.patient_name FROM ods.tbl_chart c JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON c.pt_no = p.pt_no WHERE c.chart_date BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate ORDER BY c.chart_date DESC

title: chart_by_doctor
description: SELECT c.*, p.patient_name FROM ods.tbl_chart c JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON c.pt_no = p.pt_no WHERE c.doctor_name = :doctorName ORDER BY c.chart_date DESC

title: record_by_patient
description: SELECT r.*, p.patient_name FROM ods.tbl_form r JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON r.pt_no = p.pt_no WHERE r.pt_no = :ptNo ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

title: record_by_chart
description: SELECT r.*, p.patient_name FROM ods.tbl_form r JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON r.pt_no = p.pt_no WHERE r.chart_no = :chartNo ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

title: patient_stats_by_gender
description: SELECT gender, COUNT(*) as count, AVG(age) as avg_age FROM ods.tbl_patient GROUP BY gender

title: recent_charts
description: SELECT c.*, p.patient_name FROM ods.tbl_chart c JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON c.pt_no = p.pt_no ORDER BY c.created_at DESC LIMIT :limit

title: record_by_pt_no
description: SELECT r.*, p.patient_name FROM ods.tbl_form r JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON r.pt_no = p.pt_no WHERE r.pt_no = :ptNo ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

title: record_by_chart_no
description: SELECT r.*, p.patient_name FROM ods.tbl_form r JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON r.pt_no = p.pt_no WHERE r.chart_no = :chartNo ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

title: record_by_pt_no_and_chart_no
description: SELECT r.*, p.patient_name FROM ods.tbl_form r JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON r.pt_no = p.pt_no WHERE r.pt_no = :ptNo AND r.chart_no = :chartNo ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
